items.content_html: tonight might be the last nuggets game until October, and that really bums me out. it’s been such a good distraction these past three months 🏀

items.content_html: our hearts are just made out of strings to be pulled
items.content_text: our hearts are just made out of strings to be pulled

items.content_html: i guess it’s all just part of it. we love and we lose. we’re in motion until we’re not. time relentlessly, quietly lumbers on, and we find ourselves farther and farther from where we started. we know where we thought we’d be but not where we end up.
items.content_text: i guess it’s all just part of it. we love and we lose. we’re in motion until we’re not. time relentlessly, quietly lumbers on, and we find ourselves farther and farther from where we started. we know where we thought we’d be but not where we end up.

There will be feasting and dancing in Jerusalem next year I am going to make it through this year If it kills me

  • The Mountain Goats - This Year
items.content_text:
> There will be feasting and dancing in Jerusalem next year
I am going to make it through this year
If it kills me

- The Mountain Goats - _This Year_

items.content_html:
Sasquatch coyly waved at me with a fleeting smile. “Your beer’s gone skunk,” they mumbled, lumbering away.

“How do you figure?”

“My nose is proportional to my feet. It’s skunk.”

And they were gone. The beer tasted fine. Not great, but fine.
items.content_text:
Sasquatch coyly waved at me with a fleeting smile. “Your beer’s gone skunk,” they mumbled, lumbering away. 

“How do you figure?”

“My nose is proportional to my feet. It’s skunk.” 

And they were gone. The beer tasted fine. Not great, but fine.

items.content_html: I’m thinking about getting a new camera sometime soon. I’m leaning towards the FujiFilm X-Pro3, but I’m a little worried that the rangefinder experience will be more frustrating than fun.
